description: Style definitions for the Tic Tac Toe web application's frontend components, including theme management and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container styling with theme colors and layout settings.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including animation for spinning effect.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling with layout definitions for alignment and background settings.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Grid layout for the Tic Tac Toe game board.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for individual squares in the game, including hover effects.

classes.name: game-info
classes.description: Styling for the game information display.

classes.name: game-status
classes.description: Styles for displaying the game status.

classes.name: reset-button
classes.description: Styles for the button to reset the game, including hover and active effects.
